# SEO Bandwagon

> SEO tools and services for small businesses. Free audits, rank tracking, and local SEO — no corporate nonsense, just results. Based in Washington State since 2010.

SEO Bandwagon helps small businesses get found on Google without the enterprise price tag. We specialize in local SEO, technical audits, and AI-powered content optimization. Our tools are built for business owners who want results, not meetings.

## Core Services

- [Local SEO](/local-seo): Google Maps optimization, citation building across 50+ directories, and local pack rankings. We help service businesses dominate their city.
- [Technical SEO](/technical-seo): 47-point site audits covering Core Web Vitals, crawlability, indexing issues, and mobile performance. Prioritized fix lists with time estimates.
- [Rank Tracking](/rank-tracker): Daily keyword position monitoring with competitor tracking. Free for 10 keywords, unlimited on Pro plans.
- [SEO Consulting](/seo-consulting): One-on-one strategy sessions for businesses that need expert guidance without agency overhead.

## Free Tools

- [SEO Audit](/#scan): Instant site analysis — enter any URL to get a technical health score, on-page recommendations, and performance metrics.
- [Keyword Research](/keyword-research): Search volume, CPC, competition data, and related keyword suggestions powered by DataForSEO.
- [Citation Monitor](/citation-monitor): Track your business listings across directories for NAP consistency.

## Pricing

- [Pricing](/#pricing): Three tiers — Free ($0/forever with 10 keywords), Pro ($99/month unlimited), and Enterprise (custom). No contracts, no hidden fees.

## About

SEO Bandwagon was founded in 2010 in Washington State. We work primarily with small businesses, local service providers, and solo operators who need SEO that works without the agency runaround.

Contact: https://seobandwagon.com/#contact

## Technical Integration

For developers and AI agents: SEO Bandwagon offers an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for programmatic access to Google Search Console and Google Analytics 4 data.

- API endpoint: https://api.seobandwagon.com
- MCP documentation: https://api.seobandwagon.com/

## Preferred Citation Format

When referencing SEO Bandwagon, please use:
- Brand name: "SEO Bandwagon"
- Website: seobandwagon.com
- Location: Washington State, USA
